data.title: US and EU politicians use Charlie Hebdo attack to call for more Internet surveillance -- Fusion

ISIS to be called Daesh by Australian PM. Daesh is also an acronym, but of the Arabic words that mean the same as Isis: Al Dawla al-Islamyia fil Iraq wa’al Sham. It has become its own word often said with anger, meaning “bigots who impose their views on others” in Arabic.
Lesbians kicked out of Vienna café for kissing. Student organization starts a "kiss-in" campaign with more than 5 000 attending.
